channel.title: Dropping items
channel.description: how do i make it to when you drop something it disappears but make it to where it DOES drop stuff if you die. also how can i make it to where i don't lose any items (owner,admin) after i die?

item.title: Dropping items
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:407040”]//Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId()); c.sendMessage("you dropped the item and it disappears"); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]); } else { c.sendMessage("This items cannot be dropped."); }[/quote]
thanks alot for the both of you rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Dropping items
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

[quote=“p0sesed s0ul, post:2, topic:407040”]Well, to make items disappear if you drop them (I assume your using PI from your last post) go into server > model > players> packet > dropItem.java

and search

If you comment that out items will just disappear if you drop them

as for the 2nd part with admins not losing items, I posted that in your commands post…[/quote]

TYY so much. after you drop an item can you make it to where it says “you dropped the item and it disappears” how could i do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Dropping items
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

Well, to make items disappear if you drop them (I assume your using PI from your last post) go into server > model > players> packet > dropItem.java

and search

If you comment that out items will just disappear if you drop them

as for the 2nd part with admins not losing items, I posted that in your commands post…
